posts.postText:
Today, someone told me a new TTT Rule.
"If you're close to the edge, and someone intentionally pushes you off, its not RDM"
Thats a bullshit rule and should be reversed now.
RDM is RDM, and that is bullshit.

>> Ben":2dx7hntn]
Today, someone told me a new TTT Rule.
"If you're close to the edge, and someone intentionally pushes you off, its not RDM"
Thats a bullshit rule and should be reversed now.
RDM is RDM, and that is bullshit.
 
It is rdm, it always has been rdm, and that idiot that said that obviously does not play on our servers much.

He said you made that rule.
P.S. HumbleBrick said it.

>> Ben":abm044r2]
He said you made that rule.
P.S. HumbleBrick said it.

 

I never said anything even close to that, ever.
Might want to talk to him again.
